descriptive.question: What is on the floor?
answer: The floor is red and green.
There are five cups on the table.

explanatory.question: Why does [person_1] turn his head to the left?
answer: [person_1] sits in order to play the drums more conveniently.
[person_1] is holding the didgeridoo in his hands to play.
The plate fell to the ground.

predictive.question: What does [person_1] intends to do?
answer: [person_1] intends to lift himself up and move to the wheelchair next to him.
[person_1] intends to fold over the other side of the paper and tape it down.
reason: It is likely that [person_1] legs will be tired.
[person_1] is very excited about the game.

counterfactual.question: What if [person_1] didn't check his position?
answer: It is probable that [person_1] will fall again.
reason: Because bowls can also hold food.
Some people are sitting on the floor watching [person_1].
